mapper.select: select t1.* from (SELECT t1.`ADDRESS`, t1.`APP`, t1.`ID`, t1.`STATUS`, t1.`UPDATE_TIME` FROM `JOBS_REGISTRY` t1 ) t1 where id=#{id}
